DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study compare pharmacokinetic profile establish good control liberation test product ( Tramadol HCL OAD tablets 200 mg , Labopharm ) bioavailability relation commercialise reference ( Zytram® tablets 200 mg , Zambon ) , single dose administer .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Bioavailability Between Two Tramadol Formulations : Study Better Controlled Release New 200 mg Once A Day ( OAD ) Formulation Versus Zytram® 200 mg
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject either gender Age 18 45 year Body mass index 19 27kg/m2 Normal medical history Normal clinically significant physical examination finding Normal clinically significant finding analytical test Negative hepatitis B , hepatitis C HIV serology Negative drug abuse urine Negative pregnancy test females The subject understand accepts study procedures grant write his/her inform consent Did fulfill inclusion criterion Organic disorder underwent major surgery , within 90 day study screen Psychiatric history Alcohol drink intake great 30gr/day Cigarette smoking great 10 cigarettes/day Excessive consumption food beverage contain xanthine ( five unit coffee , tea cola per day ) Medical treatment within 30 day screen , and/or medication 7 day start study Participation clinical study donate blood within 90 day start study Antecedents gastric , hepatic , renal kind disorder could affect ADME ( absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion study drug ) Hepatitis B , hepatitis C HIV positive serology Pregnant breastfeeding Clinically relevant hypersensitivity ( particular drug ) Woman take oral contraceptive drug Incapable communicate cooperate investigator
